JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and Responsibilities Software Developer will be responsible for - 1) Analysis of requirements, implementation ,testing and documentation of Automotive Software components (Diagnostic).2) Responsible for maintaining quality of Software deliverables & Review. 3) Candidate will be involved in entire Software development LifeWell versed in C’ coding according to Misra standards, Must have Automotive CAN/LIN communication knowledge. Good understanding in SDLC. Self-driven, Motivated. Hands on experience in Embedded Software Development, Embedded C. Should know Software Development life cycle. Experience in AUTOSAR with Diagnostic Error Manager and DCM implementation. Working knowledge of Automotive Communication Protocol like CAN,LIN and Diagnostics (ISO 14229, UDS on CAN/K-line). Transport Protocol Standards (ISO 15765) Experience with Vector tools like CANoe, CANalyzer, Geny, CANdela, ODX, Vector Davinci Developer, Vector Configurator Pro etc. Experience with VW Specification would be added advantage.

EDUCATION.PG: M.Tech in Any Specialization, MCA in Any Specialization, MBA/PGDM in Any Specialization
